author: Jordan Greer
comment: Mostly, the app does what it's supposed to do, but I do experience some pretty significant glitches. Any time I try to use the note function on the watch, the app crashes. Random punch-ins and punch-outs appear in my event log. The app can be moved to the SD card, but doing so causes it to be uninstalled from the watch. I use this app every day to keep track of my hours; please fix these glitches, and I'll be happy.  I'm using it on a ZenWatch 2 with a Galaxy S5.

author: Will Johnson
comment: I've been using this app for over a year now and love it. Of all the time card apps, this one works best with Wear. Punch in and punch out is effortless from the watch. Also the UI on both phone and watch are clean and simple. My only suggestion would be to add voice commands for Wear. I would love to be able to say "OK Google, clock me in/out" and have it do it!
title: Works perfectly with Wear.

author: Squalle Squ
comment: If I work 7p to 7a, I punch in at 7p, but it doesn't carry over to the next day. It shows that I worked 7a to 7p.
title: Doesn't work for 3rd shifters.

author: Prince Williams
comment: Does what it says! Worked great along with Tasker and my Android Wear device to auto prompt me to punch in/out from my watch and then create a useful log of all my hours worked!
title: Perfect for logging work hours

comment: It's a pretty decent time tracking application. I wish there were a chrome plugin and Google Drive sync.

author: Andrei Paval
comment: Smart Wifi does not work very well, automatically creates punchin events when I am at home, so nowhere near the selected wifi.

author: Amit Chavan
comment: The app is great exactly what I was looking for. Please add total hours on each day in your calender view, it will allow quik glance at weeks and months activity. Thanks....

author: Rose Flosser
comment: Need something to show the unpaid breaks but other then that it's ok
title: Unpaid  breaks

author: Mohamed Talaat
comment: We need to choose first day of the month and i will give it 5 stars
title: First day of the month

author: Michael Pagano
comment: Would like an option to remove ads.
title: Works well

author: Ilya Paskhover
comment: Please, fix a calculation of overtime hours - "undertime" hours are not taken in account.

author: andreas larsen
comment: Easy to use. It looks great. The smart WiFi setting is awesome!!
title: Perfect

author: Pranjal Bhatnagar
comment: Love the app, helps me being productive and times me to work
All cleaning
title: Housekeeping

author: Myke
comment: Quick easy way to keep track of working hours.

author: Allan Rodgers
comment: Nice app would like add free version

author: gunter may
comment: Love it , does what I want from it !!!

author: gregorio carbajal
comment: Free excellent app.

author: Everardo Gaxiola
comment: Work great

author: Saman Sadeghi
comment: Works well, has some room for improvement.
title: Good Time Clock App

author: Richard Servello
comment: Use this every day to log hours for clients.  I love that youth can have notes, so I can log what job I'm working on.  Wear support is invaluable.  When I go on a break I just tap my watch.  The only suggestion is, please add a slide panel on the wear app to see total hours today.  Also, when I go into the calendar view is never on the current week.  It's always one or two weeks ahead.
title: Awesome time clock!!!

author: Brent Phillips
comment: Great app that's well designed and cool. However, what about people being paid fortnightly? And also would be nice that if it notices you working over a certain amount of time you can specify that you have an unpaid break. For example if I work over 5 hours I must have a 30min break. Thanks.
title: Great except missing important features

author: Yevgeniy Podgornyy
comment: I like this app. Only one problem. Every time i do something on my watch its automatically open app on my phone. If punch in/out on my watch means i don't wanna use my phone. But for some reason it opens app on my phone every time i do clock in or clock out. Fix please and will be 5 star from me and ill donate. Thank you.
title: Nice

author: Patrick Morgan
comment: Great as long as you dont move the device and activate the orientation change, then you lose everything you just typed into that long description of the work you've just done for a client. Come on devs, you should be able to store input values on layout redraw. Fix that and its a 5 star app. Otherwise it's useless for notation if you turn quickly with device in hand.
title: Great as long as you keep perfectly still.

author: David Baker
comment: For me the only thing it is missing is that (using WiFi to punch in & out) it doesn't record & subtract my lunch break. Would prefer to see the out then back in for lunch & the time removed from my work hours.
title: Almost perfect

author: Oliver Borchert
comment: Nice little app, very simplistic and right to the point. The only addition I would like to see is a bi-weekly view/configuration to be added. But other than that - does the job great.

author: Gary Ratcliffe
comment: I can't figure out how to clock for a break? I use this with my android wear but cannot see how to register an unpaid break!
title: One issue

author: Noam Asulin
comment: I searched for an app that will work with my Moto 360.  All I needed was the oprion to punch in /out,  nothing more,  and this app does a really good job in it!  well done
title: Love it!

author: Lino Veiga
comment: I work overnight 7PM to 7:30AM, with lunch around midnight, this app did not work after punching in at 7 I did not have the option to punch out at midnight only in again, probably too complicated to make it work for me, only way I can make it work, is to change my start and end times to AM start PM end this way it stays on same day, this means I cannot use the punch in and out feature, I have to enter the punch times manually.
title: Nice but failed on overnight.

author: Tyler Reid
comment: This app is amazing for tracking my work hours for various clients. HOWEVER! I would love to be able to pay to remove the ads from the app. Even if you make it $4.99, I would pay to remove ads.
title: Great except for one thing

author: Jens Knutson
comment: The app is pretty good in general, and it's improving noticeably with every release, but the standout feature it is support for Android Wear.  Support for sync/Google Drive storage and a way to pay away the ads are the only significant missing features for me.
title: Wear support is awesome

author: Shannon Hooper
comment: I work overnights, need to track from 7 pm Monday to 5 am Tuesday for instance. (With a lunch in/out at 2 am on Tuesday).  Otherwise really good app.
title: No Overnight available

author: Brian Scrivener
comment: One thing I can't stand is adverts. Is there a way to remove them? I don't mind paying for premium apps. But will remove if I can't get rid of adds.
title: Adverts

author: Stephen De Tomasi
comment: Android wear is great with this. I would like the ability to start and stop an unpaid break though.
title: Great app, support for breaks would be nice

author: Andrea Pignani
comment: Semplice, intuitiva e funziona senza intoppi. Sarebbe molto utile poter impostare di default i minuti di break giornaliero non retribuito.
title: Utile e ben fatta

author: Freeline Asia
comment: It shows multiple entries when punching in and out when using wear app

author: Daniel Barreto Lutz
comment: The app is awesome. My only complaint is that, sometimes, the advertisements overlap the bottom menu.
title: Awesome

author: Stephanie F.
comment: Nice android wear integration. I wish there was a way to delete events in the list when I do accidentally punch in or out.
title: Great simple app

author: Roberto Gogoni
comment: It would be great if we could have a no ads paid version of the app. Keep up with the good work!
title: Loved it!

author: Anthony Cockell
comment: I combine this nfc unlock + tasker (root apps) for an invisible and seamless experience. 5* for paid option.
title: Brilliant!
